summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 22.900G.010, 22.900G.015, 23.41.012, 23.47A.012, 23.73.009, 23.73.010, and 23.84A.038, and adding new Sections 23.73.005, 23.73.012, 23.73.014, 23.73.016, 23.73.018, and 23.73.024 to the Seattle Municipal Code, and amending the fee schedules for the Department of Neighborhoods and Office of Housing, in order to designate a Conservation Core area within the Pike/Pine Conservation Overlay District and to establish and administer a transfer of development potential program for the Conservation Overlay District to better preserve and enhance the character of the Pike/Pine neighborhood.
